level.heading: License fee; display.
level.text: ยง 20-245 License fee; display. a. The annual fee for such license shall be twenty-five dollars. b. Each such license shall be displayed in a conspicuous place in the office or place of business of the licensee, or if a vehicle is used, in such vehicle, or if a guide has no office or uses no vehicle, he or she shall carry such license on his or her person at all times.
